text: The 1929 FA Cup Final was contested by Bolton Wanderers and Portsmouth at Wembley. Bolton won 2–0, with goals by Billy Butler and Harold Blackmore. ==Match details== {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0"
